>

The hills were in orbit around the main planet with our hill on it. NONE OF THAT S\*\*\*\*y gravity problems.

> 5 hours ago, HansonKerman said:
> 
> 
> 
> 

No need to.

The newborn planetoid made of former hilletoids is slowed by tidal forces and falls onto the main planet where the named hill was.

Kaboom!!!
Does not happen because they were in orbit, and the planetoid would also be in orbit. BaDum
The planetoid was torn apart by tidal forces, and one half of it still made kaboom, FuBar.
We conquer that.

Don;t worry, [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/), I can deal with [@kerbiloid](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129408-kerbiloid/)
This doesn't matter. Not [@kerbiloid](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129408-kerbiloid/) did that, but blindly destructive forces of nature.
Shush.
So, that's how you call'em?
Whaaat? Can't heeeear youuuuuuu
Hill and planet are ours.
Unknown object type: our.

I make everyone type in cursive except [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/), [@TeslaPenguin1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185112-teslapenguin1/), and me. (You can still type Lucida, hanson)
Fun.
I clone Joey Chestnut a few thousand times then make all of the Joey's eat the hill planet. After they all burst from over eating, I storm the mound of Joey and put a small hill on top of them.

I flood your computer servers. I am able to take it over while you are all lagging. I also free [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/) and [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) from the legendary lag.

our hill!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Can you please switch your font to Lucida Sans Unicode?
I use the huge armored suit from BF1 because according to the game it can take a tank shell. I storm the hill.
I take the hill with a bunch of heavily armed spaceships. Our hill.

Heavily *leg*ged transports destroy the heavily *arm*ed spaceships.
